label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_030
content:
## 2024-10-01 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 10371775
- Unique source IPs: 1687
- Unique destination IPs: 5052
- Average flow duration (sec): 34.8
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 80.2
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 13.4
- ICMP percentage: 0.8
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 116
- East-West traffic percentage: 57.1

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 2333924
- Unique domains: 46016
- NXDOMAIN responses: 10287
- DGA suspected domains: 2
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 3601
- Average response time (ms): 3.7
- Cache hit percentage: 91.1
- TXT record queries: 294
- PTR queries: 6827

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 727
- Blocked by IPS: 95
- Signature matches: 674
- Anomaly detections: 18
- Severity critical: 2
- Severity high: 11
- Severity medium: 56
- Severity low: 208
- Top signatures:
  - ET WEB_SERVER SQL Injection Attempt
  - ET POLICY curl User-Agent Outbound
  - ET POLICY SMB2 NT Create File
- False positive rate percentage: 11.7

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 5.32
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 1.91
- WAN peak (Gbps): 6.94
- LAN core utilization percentage: 39.1
- DMZ utilization percentage: 34.7
- VPN concentrator sessions: 265
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 0.85
- Top talker IP: 10.29.134.241
- Top talker bytes (GB): 36.9

### Bgp Changes
- Prefix announcements: 0
- Prefix withdrawals: 1
- AS path changes: 4
- Route flaps: 0
- Peer sessions established: 4
- Peer sessions down: 1
- Max prefix warnings: 1
- Communities changed: 1

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 4
- New entries for org domains: 0
- Suspicious issuances: 1
- Expired certs in use: 1
- TLS 1.0 connections: 4
- TLS 1.1 connections: 2
- TLS 1.2 connections: 76735
- TLS 1.3 connections: 190514
- Weak cipher usage: 2

### Infrastructure
- Netflow-collector-01:
  - CPU percentage: 65
  - Memory percentage: 70
  - Disk percentage: 72
- Dns-resolver-01:
  - CPU percentage: 31
  - Memory percentage: 56
  - Cache size (GB): 2.4
- Ids-sensor-01:
  - CPU percentage: 53
  - Memory percentage: 63
  - PPS: 139906
- Ids-sensor-02:
  - CPU percentage: 37
  - Memory percentage: 55
  - PPS: 83804
- Border-router-01:
  - CPU percentage: 23
  - Memory percentage: 48
  - Interface errors: 1

### Events
- IDS signature ET WEB_SERVER tuned: updated to latest ruleset
- NetFlow anomaly: uncommon protocol from 10.9.235.56 — automated block applied
- TLS audit: deprecated cipher on monitoring-agent — waiver in place

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-10-01. 10371775 flows analyzed. 2333924 DNS queries. 727 IDS alerts (2 critical, 11 high). WAN avg 5.32/1.91 Gbps in/out. 0 BGP announcements.
